poem:
Title: "In The Shadow of Rhetoric"

Trump stirs the pond – a jab, a jeer,
Echoing 'unified reich', void of fear.
Kamala Harris, in the wings, stands tall,
Appalled, yet unsurprised by the call.
Both amplified in media's harsh lights,
Tossed in the tempest of political fight.
Oh, the drama that these headlines hold,
American spotlight, icy and bold.
